seo.title: Tax advantages for freelancers in Paraguay | Low taxes and facilities for entrepreneurs
seo.description: Discover why Paraguay is attractive for freelancers and self-employed individuals. Low taxes, facilities for entrepreneurship, and cheap labor. Favorable climate and banked economy. The perfect place to work and do business. #Paraguay #Freelancers #Business
seo.keywords: Paraguay, freelancers, self-employed, low taxes, facilities for entrepreneurs, cheap labor

article.paragraph: Paraguay is one of the most attractive countries for doing business in Latin America, thanks to its policy of low taxes and ease of doing business. This makes it especially interesting for those freelancers and self-employed individuals looking to establish their business in a favorable economic environment.
article.title1: Low taxes and exemptions for freelancers
article.paragraph1: One of the main tax advantages offered by Paraguay is its 10% VAT. If you are a freelancer and sell services or products within the country, you will only have to pay 10% value-added tax. But if your services are for clients outside the country, you will be exempt from paying this tax.
article.paragraph1.1: In addition, income tax is also quite low in Paraguay. Freelancers and entrepreneurs pay only 10% income tax, which is a very low rate compared to other countries in the region. And if you decide to open an LLC in the United States, you will also be exempt from paying taxes, as dividends from foreign companies do not pay taxes in Paraguay.
article.title2: Favorable climate for business in Paraguay
article.paragraph2: Another advantage of Paraguay is its favorable economic climate for doing business. The country has cheap labor and great ease for making business contacts. In addition, the restrictions for establishing businesses are much lower than in Europe, making it an attractive destination for entrepreneurs of all kinds.
article.title3: Banking infrastructure and facilities for payments
article.paragraph3: As for banking infrastructure, Paraguay is well banked, making it easy and convenient to pay with a card and find ATMs almost anywhere, even in supermarkets.
article.paragraph3.1: In conclusion, if you are a freelancer or entrepreneur looking for a favorable economic environment to establish your business, Paraguay is an excellent option. With its low value-added tax and income tax, as well as its favorable economic climate for doing business and banking infrastructure, this country is an attractive destination for those looking to establish their business in Latin America.
